subject: Throttle not working
description_text:
Hello I am trying to set up my pedals and the throttle does not register
any input on the app, I have already tried offsetting and calibrating

conversations.body_text: Hi LaFame,  Please provide your order number. Also, check and share photos of the sensor position, and confirm whether the spring is missing or the pressure plate is damaged. Additionally, please send a screenshot of the Offset popup in SIMSONN Manager so I can review it.

My order on amazon is Order # 111-1397968-4301854


On Thu, Jan 8, 2026 at 6:26 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi，LaFame，     When you click Offset here, do you still see no throttle signal?  Please try swapping the throttle and clutch pedals to check whether the issue is with the throttle pedal itself or the throttle input on the controller.

[image: image.png]

On Thu, Jan 8, 2026 at 7:09 PM service@simsonn.com
This is what it shows when I click offset
I switched the cable to the clutch and it still doesn't show any input.
Hi LaFame,  Please provide your contact name, address, and phone number, and we will send you a replacement throttle pressure sensor for installation.

Emmanuel Ibarra
355 E Linden Ave, Reedley, CA 93654
5597364213

On Thu, Jan 8, 2026 at 7:20 PM service@simsonn.com
How soon would I be getting the part?
Hi LaFame,  We will send you a replacement as soon as possible.

Can you please provide tracking number?

On Fri, Jan 9, 2026 at 2:34 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi LaFame,  Hello, we have sent you a new replacement part. Here is the tracking number: SF6047232994902. You can track it via https://www.sf-international.com/cn/en/support/querySupport/waybill

Hello I'd like to cancel my order, you are sending me a replacement part
that is going to take 27 days to arrive rather than sending a new set
quickly? It doesn't make sense considering I can return these and order
another pair from amazon.

On Sat, Jan 10, 2026 at 12:36 AM service@simsonn.com

I do not want to wait that long to have to replace a part on a brand new
item that I just purchased, I am willing to keep the pedals but I would
like an exchange instead. That is a ridiculous wait for a brand new item.
Hi LaFame,  The package will take 7-14 days to deliver.
